title: Seriously? RITO PLS
body:
Could they not make the matchmaking a LITTLE MORE EVEN? Like seriously come onnnnnnnnnnn, can you PLEASE FIX THE FREAKING MATCHMAKING SYSTEM IDGAF IF ITS OFFPEAK OR IF NORMALS MMR IS DIFFERENT THERE ARE SO MANY WAYS THESE TEAMS COULDVE BEEN MADE MORE EVEN

http://puu.sh/d8YXO/3185ca1438.png

replies.body:
My Gold ranked 5s team played against Avant garde redemption. I didn't sook about how matchmaking sucks. I enjoyed the fact I got to see how good they played together.

If you want a fair games, where everyones rank is fairly close, play ranked. Normals are meant to be casual.
lol, ive played against DW Charlie (Master) and 2 Diamonds and im only Bronze 3

Think of it as an opportunity to learn more about the game as people better than you show you how it's done. Plus this is normals, you should try to win but also improve at the same time.

Sure getting bronzies on the enemy team gives you an easy win but you don't learn anything. It's like playing against Beginner bots. Winning against them doesn't teach you anything.
